cause.description:
America needs leadership with a taste of moderatism. Giuliani isn't your average Die Hard Republican Conservative. Neither is he a hidden Liberal within the GOP. He's a candidate that knows how to protect the American people while preserving reasonable civil liberties and rights.
1. American National Security is a big priority
2. Tax Cuts and Fiscal Conservativism should be the way of our economy
3. Neither being too far right or left is the way the next American President should be
cause.name: Rudy Giuliani for President
